Purpose: Define requirements for discovery of resources and relationships that are common to all Swordfish conformant implementations.

Systems.Purpose: If Storage is attached to a ComputerSystem rather than instantiated as a Standalone instance.

StorageSystems.Purpose: If Storage is attached to a ComputerSystem rather than instantiated as a Standalone instance.

ConditionalRequirements.Purpose: ConditionalRequirements: The implementation must choose at least one selected media container (appropriate for the system's selected media type) and instantiate a collection for it.  This may be instantiated as a CapacitySources structure to feed a StoragePool, FileSystem, or Volume.  When drives are used, the Drives Collection in either Storage or, when implementing the ClassOfService Feature, StorageServices shall be implemented.
ConditionalRequirements: When drives are used, the Drives Collection in Chassis shall be implemented.

HostingRoles.Purpose: Swordfish implementations must specify a hosting role type of StorageServer.
